<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Side]] of the [[local]] instance of the flag. A getter for [[setFlagSide]].

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_flagSide =  [[flagSide]] flag;</code>
